monster.name: Mindstone-Shard Ghoul
languages: Understands all languages it spoke in life but can't speak

trait.name: Shard of the Crystal
entries: While under the influence of a mindstone, whenever the ghoul makes an attack roll or a saving throw, they add {@dice 1d4} to the attack roll or save.

trait.name: Unusual Nature.
entries: This crfeature doesnâ€™t require air, food, drink, or sleep.

action.name: Multiattack.
entries: The su-monster makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its claws.

action.name: Bite.
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) piercing damage.

action.name: Claw.
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 2d6 + 2}) slashing damage.

action.name: Mind Crush {@recharge 5}
entries: The ghoul targets one creature it can sense within 30 feet of it. The target must succeed on a {@dc 10} Wisdom saving throw or take 17 ({@damage 5d6}) psychic damage and be {@condition stunned} until the end of it's next turn.

spell.name: Curse Unbound
entries: Eight rays of light flash from you in a 60-foot Cone. Each creature in the Cone makes a Dexterity saving throw. For each target, roll {@dice 1d100} to determine which curse affects it, consulting the table.

entries.caption: Prismatic Rays
rows: The character cannot turn right until the curse is lifted.
Characters feet always sink at least 1 inch into any surface they walk on.
All food becomes tasteless.
When the character fires a ranged weapon, the ammunition always breaks on impact (this has no effect on damage).
Until the curse is lifted, when the character falls to 0 {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB}, roll a {@dice 1d100}. If you roll equal to or below the CR of the creature that cursed you, you instantly die.
A player must close every door they walk through, even if there are people behind them.
A player's weapon becomes lodged inside the body of their enemy after any stab attack, a strength check (DC 15) is needed to free the weapon.
A player's weapons become twice as heavy, requiring two actions to strike once, until the curse is lifted.
